languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, связь с отрядом потеряна. Наблюдатели докладывают об ослепительной вспышке, замеченной в чаще пораженного сектора. И докладывают об идущей ударной волне. Храни их Император".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, связь с отрядом потеряна. Наблюдатели докладывают об ослепительной вспышке, замеченной в чаще пораженного сектора. И докладывают об идущей ударной волне. Храни их Император".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the troop. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted in the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the troop. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted in the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

languages.text: “大人，我们与小队失去了联系。观察员报告说，受灾地区中心爆发出了炫目的闪光，一道冲击波正在迫近。神皇啊，救救他们吧。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

traits.locale_text: “大人，我们与小队失去了联系。观察员报告说，受灾地区中心爆发出了炫目的闪光，一道冲击波正在迫近。神皇啊，救救他们吧。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, hemos perdido contacto con el escuadrón. Los observadores informan que se ha visto un destello cegador en el corazón del sector afectado. Y que se aproxima una onda de choque. Que el Dios Emperador les ayude».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, hemos perdido contacto con el escuadrón. Los observadores informan que se ha visto un destello cegador en el corazón del sector afectado. Y que se aproxima una onda de choque. Que el Dios Emperador les ayude».

languages.text: 「陛下、分隊との連絡が取れなくなりました。観察者によると、影響を受けたセクターの中心部で、まばゆい閃光が目撃されました。そして衝撃波が近づいているとのことです。神帝陛下、どうか彼らを助けてください」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、分隊との連絡が取れなくなりました。観察者によると、影響を受けたセクターの中心部で、まばゆい閃光が目撃されました。そして衝撃波が近づいているとのことです。神帝陛下、どうか彼らを助けてください」

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, l'escouade ne répond plus. Les vigies ont rapporté qu'un éclair aveuglant avait été observé au cœur de la zone touchée. Une onde de choc est également en approche. Que l'Empereur-Dieu leur vienne en aide. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, l'escouade ne répond plus. Les vigies ont rapporté qu'un éclair aveuglant avait été observé au cœur de la zone touchée. Une onde de choc est également en approche. Que l'Empereur-Dieu leur vienne en aide. »

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, der Kontakt zu unserem Trupp ist abgebrochen. Die Beobachter berichten von einem gleißenden Blitz im Herzen des betroffenen Sektors. Dann hat sich eine Schockwelle genähert. Der Gottimperator helfe ihnen."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, we've lost contact with the squad. The observers report that a blinding flash was spotted at the heart of the afflicted sector. And that there is a shock wave approaching. God-Emperor help them."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, der Kontakt zu unserem Trupp ist abgebrochen. Die Beobachter berichten von einem gleißenden Blitz im Herzen des betroffenen Sektors. Dann hat sich eine Schockwelle genähert. Der Gottimperator helfe ihnen."
